```{r m_f_ratio}
# Calculate the global male:female ratio

sex_data <- notification %>% 
            filter(year == report_year - 1) %>% 
            select(newrel_m014, newrel_m15plus, newrel_mu, newrel_f014, newrel_f15plus, newrel_fu) %>% 
            summarise_all(sum, na.rm = TRUE) %>% 
            mutate(m_f_ratio = (newrel_m014 + newrel_m15plus +newrel_mu) / 
                                (newrel_f014 + newrel_f15plus + newrel_fu))

```

Global male:female ratio `r paste("in", report_year - 1, ":", display_num(sex_data$m_f_ratio))`
